_header: Of love were liking of to lere

Chetham8009.First Lines:
Off love were lykynge of to lereAnd ioye tille all that wel
                    hereThat wote what love may meaneBut who so have grette haste to
                    love…
Chetham8009.Last Lines:
…To hym that made bothe nyght & dayTo brynge vs to the
                    blysse that lestis aye
Chetham8009.Editions:
Kölbing,  Eugen. 
             Ipomedon.in drei englischen Bearbeitungen.
         Breslau: Koebner, 1889. 
Sisam,  Celia,  and  Kenneth Sisam, eds.  
             The Oxford Book of Medieval English Verse.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1970: 226-34 (extracts).

                        ed.  
             Ipomadon
